attributes.action: we need more research to find a cure/cause for intracranial hyper tension
attributes.additional_details:
iih/ih is a rare brain condition that is life changing.

people with this condition suffer with the same symptoms as someone with a brain tumor but without the brain tumor.

there is no cure at the moment, people with this condition have to manage on medication, lumbar punctures or surgery. these options do not always work or  only work for short periods of time.

there is not much research or funding and it is not heard of by many people that even includes doctors!

please sign this petition to help raise awareness of this horrible condition and hopefully one day find a cure for its sufferers.
